CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL(CallType, 'Inbound'), MID( cnx__CTIInfo__c , FIND(":", cnx__CTIInfo__c)+1, (FIND(",", cnx__CTIInfo__c ) - (FIND(":", cnx__CTIInfo__c)+1)) ), IF ( CONTAINS(cnx__CTIInfo__c, "ANI"), RIGHT(cnx__CTIInfo__c, LEN(cnx__CTIInfo__c) - (FIND("DialedNumber: ", cnx__CTIInfo__c) + LEN("DialedNumber:"))), "" ) )
CustomField.label: Phone
